meanings.definition: Prepare (food) according to Jewish dietary laws.
meanings.sent1: My mom koshered the chicken before cooking it for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The butcher koshered the meat by removing the blood and certain fats.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally koshered my sandwich by adding cheese to a meat dish!
meanings.sent4: She koshered the kitchen, making sure everything was clean and in order.
meanings.sent5: The chef koshered the kitchen, ensuring all utensils were used properly.

meanings.sent1: The lawyer koshered the contract to ensure it was legally binding.
meanings.sent2: He had to kosher the deal by getting all the necessary approvals.
meanings.sent3: She tried to kosher her excuse, but no one believed her story.
meanings.sent4: The judge koshered the evidence, allowing it to be presented in court.
meanings.sent5: The company had to kosher their product to meet industry standards.
